title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama. Chat, generate, embed, pull, push and manage models with a simple Python API.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript SDK for Ollama. Use local LLMs in Node or the browser with the same API surface as the Python client.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration for Ollama. Plug any Ollama model into LangChain LLM, chat, embedding and tool-calling pipelines.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-webui/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (now named Open WebUI). ChatGPT-style interface, model management, RAG, plugins, multi-user support.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Interactive CLI wrapper around Ollama with chat history, prompt templates and markdown rendering.

title: oll4ma
summary: Lightweight Rust client for Ollama’s REST API with async support and ergonomic types.

title: ollama-rag
summary: One-command RAG pipeline using Ollama embeddings + LlamaIndex. Ingest PDFs, web pages, Notion and ask questions locally.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns any Ollama model into a GitHub Copilot replacement for inline autocomplete and chat.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration letting you use Ollama models as generators or embedders in production pipelines.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Minimal Streamlit chat app that connects to local Ollama instance with session memory and model selector.

title: ollama-n8n-node
summary: Official n8n node to call Ollama models inside no-code workflows for summarization, translation, classification, etc.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support, PVC and autoscaling.

title: ollama-docker-compose
summary: Docker-compose stack bundling Ollama, Open WebUI, PostgreSQL pgvector, Redis and Nginx for a full local LLM platform.

title: ollama-rs
summary: Community Rust crate providing strongly-typed async bindings to Ollama’s REST API with serde models.

title: ollama-go
summary: Official Go client library for Ollama. Generate, chat, pull, push and list models idiomatically in Go.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord bot that streams Ollama completions into any channel with slash commands and per-guild model settings.

title: ollama-elixir
summary: Elixir wrapper around Ollama’s REST API with GenServer behavior for back-pressure and telemetry.

title: ollama-sdks
summary: Meta-repository tracking community SDKs for C#, Swift, Kotlin, Dart/Flutter and other languages.

title: ollama-rustica
summary: Secure on-device LLM assistant combining Ollama with Rustica hardware-backed keys and Yubikey support.
